column1: A service to honor the life of Mr. Hughes will be conducted on Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 7:00 PM at Burbank Freewill Baptist Church with Rev. Randy English and Rev. Israel Hughes officiating. Music will be under the direction of Tim and Sandra Hughes. The family will receive friends at the church from 5:00 -7:00 PM on Tuesday prior to the service
column4: or at the homes of any of the family at other times.  The graveside service and interment will be conducted on Wednesday
